author: Bellular News
description:
Click this link https://sponsr.is/bootdev_bellularnews and use my code BELLULARNEWS to get 25% off your first payment for boot.dev. Sponsored by Boot.Dev.

98,000 people were playing a nine-year-old game last week. And here's the thing - Hello Games hadn't even released their new expedition for No Man's Sky yet. How can a studio keep releasing whole new mechanics and systems for free? Here's the secret. They're not. You're just not seeing the cost yet.

Join us at http://bellular.games for early access content, 20 editions of 'Loading Screen' a month and to support our team!
